title: Echoes
description: A first-time Sensation author delivers thrilling romantic suspense. Tess Carson's sister has disappeared after being implicated in the suspicious murder of her boss. The victim's son, Grant Weston, appears to want to help, but Tess is wary of his true intentions.  But when Tess begins having visions of another time and place, she starts to suspect that she may hold the key to finding her sister.
author: Erin Grady
